text:
Spinning Robo shot a beam that causes night-time stuffiness.

author: Flammiedrum

text: Earthbound is awesome. The music, the story, the characters, the sprite art, just... amazingly different. Nothing else feels like it at all. I will forever love this game. Thanks for bringing me back to the good old days.
author: HeroicPunk

text: Not a lot of RPGs could have a battle theme like that and make it work. Thanks to the game having many different battle themes, they always stay fresh. More RPGs should be like that. This theme is probably my favorite "normal battle" theme because of﻿ the bass and how Earthbound-y it feels with its wavy and detuned synths.
author: SupraDarky
